name: Dancing jellyfishes
description:
Epilepsy warning !

Dancing Jellyfishes is not a game, but a music visualizer including some space jellyfishes flashing and jumping everywhere.

So just sit down and enjoy !

All rights belongs to their respective owners.

musics credits :
